testcase.classname: NOP Admin Demo using Page Object model

testcase.system-out: Given the user launches the NOPAdmin url....................................passed Then the user verifies the header text......................................passed When the user enters "admin@yourstore.com" in email webEdit.................passed When the user enters "admin" in password webEdit............................passed Then the user clicks on login button........................................passed Then the user verifies the homePage logo....................................passed And the user logouts the application........................................passed
